lead_paragraph: Tries from flying winger Courtnall Skosan and centre Rohan Janse van Rensburg inside the opening seven minutes laid the platform for a stunning 42-25 Super Rugby quarterfinal victory for the Lions over the Canterbury Crusaders at Ellis Park on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Lions Roar Into Super Rugby Semifinals With Crusaders Win
headline.main: Lions Roar Into Super Rugby Semifinals With Crusaders Win
